actions.text: Committee on Impeachment (Hastings) ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Impeachment (Hastings). Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Bingaman with a preamble. With written report No. 101-98.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 195.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution directing the Senate Legal Counsel to bring a Civil Action to enforce subpoena of the Impeachment Trial Committee on the Articles Against Judge Alcee L. Hastings.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to bring a civil action in the name of the Impeachment Trial Committee on the Articles Against Judge Alcee L. Hastings to enforce the Committee's subpoena to William A. Borders, Jr. and to conduct related civil contempt proceedings. Authorizes the committee to continue this action until the final disposition by the Senate of the Articles of Impeachment against Judge Hastings.

titles.title: An original resolution directing the Senate Legal Counsel to bring a Civil Action to enforce subpoena of the Impeachment Trial Committee on the Articles Against Judge Alcee L. Hastings.
